experiences.title: Data Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Canadian Automobile Association
workDescription: Engineered dynamic dispatch algorithms leveraging GPS Data (**Reverse Geocoding API**) and predictive analysis (**Gen 2**) in **Python** and utilizing **Twilio** for real-time dispatching, thereby reducing service times by over **25%**.

Integrated the algorithms into production using **APIs**, **Python**, and data visualization (**Power BI**), which facilitated real-time dispatching based on proximity and predicated demand to improve customer satisfaction rates by **40%**.

Automated ETL processes and optimized data workflows via **Apache Airflow**, which resulted in a **15%** reduction in latency and significantly improved the reliability of data delivery for real-time analytics.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.subtitle: Canadian Automobile Association
workDescription: Created a conversational AI chatbot using **Google Dialogflow** to answer questions from tow facilities and CAA employees, which reduced the time to read manuals by over **50%**.

Designed and maintained informative webpages using **React** and **TSX** to provide CAA employees and tow facility personnel across **100+ teams** with up-to-date information on Gen 2 features and updates.

Established a centralized knowledge base using **Wiki.js** to store and manage **1000+** software manuals, streamlining access through tags and other advanced search filters while providing responses within **1 second**.

experiences.title: AI/ML/NLP Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Led the design and implementation of a document reverse engineering system using NLP techniques in **spaCy** and **NLTK**, resulting in a **75%** reduction in processing time and saving **$1,000,000+** in intellectual property assets.

Trained the model using ML libraries **PyTorch** and **TensorFlow** on various PDF layouts to enhance regeneration accuracy by over **90%**, the model was also sold as a microservice resulting in **$10,000+** of additional revenue.
Constructed and deployed CI/CD pipelines, through **CircleCI**, for the document reverse engineering model, enhancing system reliability by **40%** and reducing release downtime by **25%**.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Deployed the model as a serverless function in **AWS Lambda** with data being stored and queried via a **DynamoDB** database on a training dataset of over **75,000** diverse documents.

Developed a user-friendly document regeneration interface using **OutSystems**, enabling users to query and regenerate documents with advanced search functionalities (tags, filters, etc.) in less than **2 seconds**.

Coordinated with cross-functional teams to integrate the document regeneration model into existing workflows, enhancing overall productivity by **10%** and receiving commendations from several project stakeholders.
